detail_desc: Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft fleece made from recycled polyester. Jacket with a lined hood with ears on the top and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with a wide, foldover waist panel made from organic cotton jersey and ribbed hems.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft fleece made from recycled polyester. Jacket with a lined hood with ears on the top and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with a wide, foldover waist panel made from organic cotton jersey and ribbed hems.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft fleece made from recycled polyester. Jacket with a lined hood with ears on the top and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with a wide, foldover waist panel made from organic cotton jersey and ribbed hems.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft fleece made from recycled polyester. Jacket with a lined hood with ears on the top and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with a wide, foldover waist panel made from organic cotton jersey and ribbed hems.
Fully lined, ribbed bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back. Wide elastic side stripes and matching elastication at the waist.
Fully lined, ribbed bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back. Wide elastic side stripes and matching elastication at the waist.

Waist-high, fully lined bikini bottoms with medium coverage at the back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyamide content of the bikini bottoms is recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie and an appliqué in the shape of a waistcoat with decorative buttons at the front. Press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a tab and button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a tab and button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

V-neck nursing blouse in woven fabric with a unique nursing feature, small flutter sleeves and a box pleat at the front for added width. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. The blouse is lined with recycled polyester.

V-neck nursing blouse in woven fabric with a unique nursing feature, small flutter sleeves and a box pleat at the front for added width. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. The blouse is lined with recycled polyester.

Top in soft viscose jersey with elastication over the shoulders and short sleeves with overlocked hems. Wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access, and a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust. The top can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.

Top in soft viscose jersey with elastication over the shoulders and short sleeves with overlocked hems. Wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access, and a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust. The top can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned seersucker with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs that have adjustable buttoning. Seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt with a seam at the hem. Sewn-in V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned seersucker with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs that have adjustable buttoning. Seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt with a seam at the hem. Sewn-in V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in satin with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and ties at the waist. Short puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a voluminous skirt with a wide flounce at the hem.

Calf-length dress in satin with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and ties at the waist. Short puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a voluminous skirt with a wide flounce at the hem.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a sheen. V-neck, wrapover top, short, wide raglan sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a skirt with pleats front and back for added width. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a sheen. V-neck, wrapover top, short, wide raglan sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a skirt with pleats front and back for added width. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a sheen. V-neck, wrapover top, short, wide raglan sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a skirt with pleats front and back for added width. Unlined.

Long dress in sequined mesh. Narrow cut at the top, a halter neck with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and a concealed zip in one side. Concealed, adjustable elastication under the bust and a flared, heavily draping skirt. Jersey lining.

Long, sleeveless dress in an airy, softly draping weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocking at the back. Draping and a wrapover at the top with a gentle V-neck and frill trim at the sides. Lined.

Long, sleeveless dress in an airy, softly draping weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocking at the back. Draping and a wrapover at the top with a gentle V-neck and frill trim at the sides. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in lightweight twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose blend. Resort collar, a French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Open chest pocket and slits in the sides.

Track pants in fast-drying functional fabric with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Mesh-lined side pockets, contrasting colour panels down the sides and a concealed zip at the hems.

Track pants in fast-drying functional fabric with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Mesh-lined side pockets, contrasting colour panels down the sides and a concealed zip at the hems.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, draping at the top and seams with braided trims under the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the top to hold the dress in place. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Satin lining.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, draping at the top and seams with braided trims under the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the top to hold the dress in place. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Satin lining.

Long, sleeveless dress in patterned chiffon with a wide flounce over the shoulders that continues down the back. V-neck front and back and a wrapover front with a narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.
Nursing tops in soft viscose jersey with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Nursing tops in soft viscose jersey with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Shoulder bag in soft imitation leather that can also be used as a clutch. Concealed magnetic fastener at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Height approx. 18 cm. Width approx. 26 cm.

Short chiffon dress with a V-neck opening at the front, gathered yoke at the back and short, butterfly sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Satin lining.
Short chiffon dress with a V-neck opening at the front, gathered yoke at the back and short, butterfly sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Satin lining.
Bikini briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Bikini briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
Hoodie in soft pile with appliqués on the hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hoodie in soft pile with appliqués on the hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Trainers with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey. Short balloon sleeves in woven fabric with a jersey lining and concealed elastication at the hems for added volume.
Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey. Short balloon sleeves in woven fabric with a jersey lining and concealed elastication at the hems for added volume.

Short top in flock-patterned mesh. Short puff sleeves with smocked hems. Unlined.
Short top in flock-patterned mesh. Short puff sleeves with smocked hems. Unlined.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Alice band in padded velour with shimmering beads on top.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy cotton twill with a collar, metal buttons down the front, a yoke and short sleeves. Flap chest pockets with a button, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy cotton twill with a collar, metal buttons down the front, a yoke and short sleeves. Flap chest pockets with a button, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Flatlock seam at the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Flatlock seam at the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Flatlock seam at the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.

Quilted jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric designed to keep you dry during light showers and protect you from the wind. The jacket has a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets with a concealed zip to keep your valuables safe. Outer fabric and padding made from recycled polyester. The jacket has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a square neckline, lined front and wide elastic hem. Medium support.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a square neckline, lined front and wide elastic hem. Medium support.
Ballet pumps in imitation patent leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Sleeveless playsuit in a gently draping weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening with concealed buttons at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, an elasticated seam and a soft, detachable belt with D-rings at the waist, and short slits in the hems.
